metadata.title: CVE-2019-3467 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Debian-edu-config all versions < 2.11.10, a set of configuration files used for Debian Edu, and debian-lan-config < 0.26, configured too permissive ACLs for the Kerberos admin server, which allowed password changes for other Kerberos user principals.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-3467` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

debian-lan-config - 0.26
No subscription required

criterions.comment: debian-lan-config package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.26').
